item.description:
Altered books, with a focus on niches and windows.
Bring a hardcover book (sewn binding preferable- see message board), ruler, X-acto knife, adhesive, and binder clips.
We will practice cutting into blocks of pages to make niches for pictures or objects.

You can attend this meetup even if you did not make the prior meeting- just bring the supplies listed above, and you can easily join in.
item.how_to_find_us: Go in the front door,up the stairs to the right. #2 is first door on right.

group.name: The Altered Art and Assemblage Meetup Group

item.name: Altered Books
